ref_text: Copy your referral link below and send it to your friends. For every purchase made using this link, you’ll receive 5% of the purchase amount.

exploring_des: Your wallet is the gateway to all things Ethereum, the magical technology that makes it possible to explore Web3.
wrong_chain: Wrong chain id! Please Connect to {{chainName}}
refer_friends: Refer your friends to participate in the presale
switchNetwork: Switching Chain Failed. Please try to switch to chain {{chain_name}} manually.
stake_desc: Rewards in Apexar tokens will be dispensed to users at a rate of 100 APEXAR per ETH block. These rewards will be distributed over a span of few years and are contingent upon your stake's proportion in the staking pool and the annual returns percentage.
withdraw_text: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
not_enough_eth: Not enough ETH? Top up now
disclaimer: Cryptocurrency investments carry a high risk of volatility. Be aware of the tax implications, as profits may be subject to capital gains or other taxes in your jurisdiction. Cryptocurrency regulations can vary, so ensure you understand the rules in your area. Conduct thorough research and invest only what you can afford to lose.
claim_stale_help: Confirm the transaction in your wallet to stake your APEXAR now. This will automatically claim and stake all of your APEXAR tokens. Tokens will be locked for at least 7 days after the claiming process goes live.
stake_claim_success: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
stake_transction_info: {{stakeAmount}} APEXAR tokens will be staked once the transaction completes
stake_view_transaction_info: Please click on the View Transaction button for more details.
stake_waiting_approve: In order to stake APEXAR, you first need to authorize us to access the APEXAR in your wallet
transction_info_stake: {{baseToken}} tokens will be purchased and staked once the transaction is confirmed.
transction_info_stake_success: {{baseToken}} tokens have now been staked! Check the dashboard for details.
claim_success: Your tokens have been claimed successfully.
waiting_confirm_stake: In order to buy and stake your APEXAR please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
waiting_confirm_stake_2: All staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
stake_waiting_confirm: In order to stake APEXAR, please confirm the transaction in your wallet. You may need to check the wallet app if you're on mobile.
stake_popup_info: Unclaimed APEXAR that was bought using ETH or ERC-20 USDT can be staked now. Staking for APEXAR that was bought using BNB, MATIC or USDT (BEP-20, MATIC) can be staked once the presale ends. Please note that all early staked tokens can be withdrawn 7 days after token claiming goes live, which will happen after the presale has concluded.
pool_share: APEXAR staking rewards are distributed at a rate of 3 APEXAR per ETH block. Your percentage of the pool will determine what percentage of the 3 APEXAR tokens you receive.
your_purchased_popup_info: Your total purchased tokens are all tokens purchased using the connected wallet. This includes all staked and unstaked tokens purchased on Ethereum, BNB Smart Chain and Polygon.
wert_mount_desc: Please wait while we are initializing the Wert widget.
wert_disclaimer: By continuing, you're purchasing {{token}} tokens. Your tokens won't be immediately deposited to your wallet. You'll be able to claim them on the claim date that will be announced at a later date. After you claim them, they will be deposited to your wallet.
change_chain_info: Are you sure you want to change?
change_swap_text: If you purchase on BNB Smart Chain during the presale, you won't be eligible for the {{apy}}% annual returns from staking. We recommend buying on Ethereum so you qualify for staking.
address_data: Korem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
install_app: Scan the appropriate QR code below on your mobile device in order to install the Best Wallet app.
already_have: Already got the Best Wallet app?
hit_btn_connect: Hit the button below and use the QR code scanner in the Best Wallet app in order to connect.
how_to_para1: Utilize the widget at the page's pinnacle to connect your MetaMask or another wallet to this site. Subsequently, effortlessly acquire APEXAR tokens through ETH, BNB, MATIC, USDT, or a bank card.
how_to_para2: Make certain your wallet contains ETH, BNB, MATIC, or USDT for exchanging/swap with APEXAR. If your wallet lacks the required crypto, deposit it. Alternatively, opt for the Card option.
how_to_para3: Navigate to the purchase widget and designate the quantity of tokens you intend to exchange for APEXAR. Validate the transactions within your wallet, ensuring you retain sufficient ETH, BNB, or MATIC to cover gas fees.
how_to_para4: Upon acquiring APEXAR tokens, leverage them promptly by clicking on 'Staking' in the menu. Stake your tokens early to capitalize on the exceptionally high Annual Percentage Yield (APY)!
about_desc: Within the intricate realm of cryptocurrency, a tale unfolded about a canine known as Apexar the AI, the Sentinel of the Crypto Universe. Beyond his captivating appearance, it was his extraordinary blend of intellect and cunning that distinguished him as a formidable presence. Many regarded him as a guardian, a defender entrusted with the protection of the concealed intricacies within the crypto universe. Leveraging his advanced AI capabilities, Apexar traversed the boundless landscape of code and algorithms that constituted the digital realm, always maintaining a strategic advantage over those attempting to apprehend him.
what_apexar_desc: In the cryptoverse's battleground, Apexar the AI, a sentinel presiding over the digital domains, engaged in a confrontation with Floki and Shiba Inu, prominent figures in the realm of meme coins. Distinguished from the typical Scottish Terrier, Apexar's sleek, ebony coat and advanced AI endowed him with formidable prowess. This wasn't merely a clash; it unfolded as a strategic duel of intellect versus force. Apexar, armed with profound insights into the intricacies of the blockchain, outsmarted the duo, preserving the equilibrium of the cryptoverse. His triumph transcended mere dominance, emphasizing his commitment to ensuring the digital realm remained inclusive for all. It showcased his role not only as a guardian but as a sagacious custodian always several steps ahead.
apexar_swap_desc: Apexar Swap is your go-to hub for seamless and lightning-fast token exchanges. Powered by cutting-edge AI technology, Apexar ensures that every trade is not only secure but also optimized for maximum gains.
swap_chat_desc: The AI-powered crypto companion! Discuss cryptocurrencies, get market insights, and explore the world of digital assets.
adventure_list_1: Apexar actively pursues the latest in AI, blockchain, and cryptocurrency breakthroughs, leveraging his advanced AI system to gain unprecedented insights into the intricate mechanisms of blockchain technology. Navigating through complex algorithms and code effortlessly, he discerns patterns and anomalies that surpass the detection capabilities of even the most adept human programmers.
adventure_list_2: His extraordinary memory allows him to recall every transaction, block, and hash ever recorded on the blockchain. In mere seconds, he sifts through extensive data, seeking clues and establishing connections that others can only imagine.
adventure_list_3: Traversing the digital realm with unparalleled swiftness, Apexar maneuvers through the blockchain like a spectral presence in the machine. Evading security systems effortlessly, he glides through the smallest openings in firewalls and encryption algorithms.
footer_title: Mobilize the Apexar Forces! Participate in the Crypto Revolution!
footer_desc: Our team consistently interacts with the community across various platforms, fostering a genuinely community-oriented project.
roadmap_1_li_3: Apexar embarks on an elevated path with a formidable marketing initiative.
roadmap_3_li_1: Token Listings: Introduce the Apexar token on well-established DEXs, ensuring sufficient liquidity and accessibility. Public Launch of Apexar
roadmap_3_li_3: Forge Community Partnerships via Apexar Times digital newsletter
change_swap_text_new: If you purchase on {{mode}} during the presale, you won't be eligible for the {{apy}}% annual returns from staking. We recommend buying on Ethereum so you qualify for staking.
faq_cont_1: Apexar AI stands as a pioneering cryptocurrency project with a focus on artificial intelligence. Merging sophisticated AI capabilities with a profound comprehension of blockchain technology, it assumes the role of a custodian, safeguarding the concealed intricacies within the vast crypto universe.
faq_head_2: How does APEXAR Staking Mechanism work?
faq_cont_2: In the presale phase, the process of staking your APEXAR tokens allows you to commence earning rewards promptly. Following the conclusion of the presale and the activation of the claiming process, you gain the ability to promptly claim your rewards. The withdrawal of your tokens becomes feasible seven days post the claim activation. Additionally, the option to prolong your lock period emerges, enabling you to garner a multiplier on your rewards and subsequently extending the timeline for token withdrawal.
faq_cont_3: The opportunity to claim your APEXAR arises upon the conclusion of the presale. The specific date for this event will be disclosed after the presale concludes.
faq_head_4: How Can I Reach Out to the Team?
faq_cont_4: Feel free to contact the team by joining the Telegram group and connecting with one of our staff members.
claim_form_desc: Register today to secure your complimentary free APEXAR tokens!
